Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis DSM 347(60-70% Inhibition=100µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis DSM 20044(30-40% Inhibition=100µM),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 18827(no activity data),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(no activity data)
